subject: CBSNews.com Video Alert! Watch A Live Webcast Of Va. Tech Ceremony
body:
At 2 p.m. ET Katie Couric will anchor live coverage of a convocation 
ceremony at the campus of Virginia Tech. The event will be attended by 
President Bush and Virginia Gov. Tim Kaine, as well as staff, students and 
family mourning yesterday's tragedy there. Watch a live Webcast of the 
ceremony on CBSNews.com. 

Log on now to www.cbsnews.com, or wap.cbsnews.com for wireless users, for details. 

Wireless photo and video alerts from CBSNews.com, direct to your phone. Subscribe now at http://www.cbsnews.com/htdocs/wireless/index.php.
